/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents that add a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves contrasting with the urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the static cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
